posts.title: Winter break
posts.description: I just completed my first semester at San Francisco City College as an art student. I took two classes: Art 126, Color Theory and Art 145A Beginning Watercolor. I chose to study Color Theory because I felt like it would help me make more informed choices when selecting a palatte for my paintings. Watercolor has been a medium I used for character mockups in the past. I didn't know the fundementals of techqniques like wet-on-wet or glazing.
